thread.title: TruShield’s Paul Caiazzo to Speak At Science and Technology Policy Center for Development’s “Advancement and Protection of Africa’s ICT Networks”
thread.title_full: TruShield’s Paul Caiazzo to Speak At Science and Technology Policy Center for Development’s “Advancement and Protection of Africa’s ICT Networks”

author: Robyn Ilsen
title: TruShield’s Paul Caiazzo to Speak At Science and Technology Policy Center for Development’s “Advancement and Protection of Africa’s ICT Networks”
text:
TruShield Security Solutions, Inc. is proud to be a part of the Science and Technology Policy Center for Development’s (STPCD) upcoming seminar “Advancement and Protection of Africa’s ICT Networks.” TruShield’s Principal and Chief Security Architect, Paul Caiazzo, will be the speaker for this event, focused on current trends and developments in information and communication technology security in Africa. “Paul has considerable experience consulting to governments with respect to ICT and Africa” says Adley Francois, one of TruShield’s co-founders. “He understands the risks associated with cyber attacks to Africa’s ICT networks and this seminar promises to be an informative event for cyber security professionals. The insights gleaned will provide actionable steps to anyone with an interest in providing security to ICT networks in Africa.”
TruShield’s growing international reputation in cyber security for foreign governments and critical infrastructure, along with Mr. Caiazzo’s media and public speaking experience, attracted the STPCD to ask him to be the speaker for this seminar. The Science and Technology Policy Center for Development is a Washington, D.C. based non-profit that promotes science and technology policies which serve the mutual interests of the United States and developing countries. This will be their inaugural event.
Event details can be found here: http://stpcd.org/?p=63
About TruShield: TruShield Security Solutions, Inc ( http://www.trushieldinc.com ) is a concierge international cybersecurity consulting and solutions provider offering a complete suite of managed security services. TruShield works with organizations of varying sizes to help them safeguard their data, and their clients data in order to help them reduce their liabilities and maintain their reputation in the eyes of market. TruShield was founded in 2008 and works with clients on several continents across multiple industries.
